title: 70 ms , 100 fps   and stable connection  and still  have  big  lag in EUW (after lauch of 7.13)
body:
Hey  ,
After the lauch of this patch i feel like i play with 300 + ms  even though  my client show me in average 70 ms and 100 fps.
 I thought it was on my side  but i checked if someone else have the same issue  in the french's support and help forum and apparently i'm not the only one to have this issue.  
 It's the first time  it happen and   my internet is stable my computer doesn't seem to have issue  i can play other multiplayer game without issue.
 It's really weird but it doesn't seem to be  on my side.

replies.body:
We've been seeing quite a few reports for some EU players having ISP issues, and have a[ pinned thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uxE7avEp-622-connection-issues-on-eu) up currently.  To start, I recommend going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide just in case the cause might be a local issue.

Otherwise, download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to EUW: 192.64.170.252

This will give us an overview of how you're routing, and where the hiccups are.
Oh  thanks didn't see that thread i will check it.
